Communication Templates

The Communication Templates section is used to define standard messages that Unit Master can send automatically or in bulk to clients, keeping communication consistent and professional.

What are Communication Templates?

Communication Templates are reusable message layouts for emails or SMS sent from Unit Master. Instead of typing the same text every time, administrators configure a template once and then reuse it whenever the same type of message needs to be sent.

This ensures that all clients receive clear, consistent and branded communication, and it saves time for the operations and customer service teams.

Manage Communication Templates

Communication Templates are used to set up standard messages that can be sent to clients. Examples include:

  • Welcome messages for new clients.
  • Transaction confirmations (for example, subscriptions or redemptions).
  • Monthly or quarterly statement notifications.

Templates help keep communication consistent and save time when sending the same type of message to many clients.

Edit and update a template

A user can open an existing communication template, make changes to the content and click Save to update it:

Once saved, the updated template will be used for all future messages of that type, ensuring that clients always receive the latest approved wording.
